title: 24h Cancellation
text: Please cancel at least 24 hours before your appointment to avoid charges.

title: 48h Cancellation (Major)
text: Colouring, rebonding, and keratin bookings require 48 hours’ notice to cancel.

title: Same-day Cancellation
text: Same-day cancellations may incur higher fees due to the lost slot.

title: No-Show
text: No-shows are charged 100% or deposit forfeited.

title: Reschedule Window
text: Please reschedule at least 24 hours in advance to avoid fees.

title: Reschedule Limit
text: A booking can be rescheduled once; further changes require a new booking.

title: Late Arrival (10 min)
text: 10-minute grace period; we’ll do our best to complete the service.

title: Late Arrival (15 min)
text: 15-minute grace period; after that, service may be shortened or forfeited.

title: Deposit for Major Services
text: RM50 deposit may be required to secure selected services or peak times.

title: Deposit Forfeiture
text: Deposits are forfeited for no-shows or cancellations within the notice window.

title: Payment Due
text: Payment is due upon completion of service.

title: Installments
text: Installment or pay-later options are not available.

title: Service Refunds
text: Services are non-refundable; adjustments within 3 days with the same stylist.

title: Product Returns
text: Unopened products can be returned within 7 days with receipt. Restocking fee may apply.

title: Service Redo
text: Complimentary adjustment within 3 days for execution issues (not a style change).

title: Privacy
text: Client data is securely stored and not shared outside the salon.

title: Wheelchair Access
text: Ground-floor access; a portable ramp is available on request.

title: Lift Availability
text: Lift via the building lobby; please ask if you need assistance.

title: Parking
text: Limited front parking; nearby paid parking available (~RM2/hour).

title: Pet Policy
text: Only service animals are allowed inside the salon.

title: Wi?Fi & Beverages
text: Complimentary Wi?Fi and water/tea are available.

title: Food & Drink
text: Please consume outside food and drink in the waiting area only.

title: No Smoking/Vaping
text: Smoking and vaping are not permitted inside the salon.

text: Please contact the salon lead within 48 hours for service concerns.

text: A different stylist of similar level may be assigned if your stylist is unavailable.

text: Appointments may be rescheduled for safety; affected clients get priority.

title: Cleanliness & Hygiene
text: Tools are disinfected regularly; capes and towels are replaced between clients.

title: Chat Etiquette
text: Please keep messages concise during peak hours; we reply as soon as possible.

title: Data Access Control
text: Only authorized staff can access client records using traceable logins.

title: Stylist Preferences
text: We try to honor stylist requests; availability may vary.

text: Redos cover execution issues only; not changes of mind or new styles.

title: Right to Refuse Service
text: We may refuse service in cases of aggressive behavior, intoxication, or unsafe conditions.

text: Processing times are set by stylist assessment for hair health and safety.

title: Late Payment
